DOC.brief_title: A Phase I/II Study Carboplatin Etoposide With Without Obatoclax Extensive-stage Small Cell Lung Cancer ( ES-SCLC )
DOC.detailed_description: In Phase I portion , 3 hour 24 hour infusion obatoclax carboplatin etoposide every 3 week evaluate different dos . In Phase II portion , 3 hour infusion obatoclax without carboplatin etoposide every three week evaluate response rate .
